titleStmt.title: The triumph of the Church over water and fire. Or A thankfull gratulation for that miraculous deliverance of the Church and state of Great Britaine, from the Romish Tophet: or, that barbarous and savage Powder-plot As it was delivered (for substance) in a sermon at Blacke Fryers in London on the fifth of November. 1625. By Theodor Hering, minister of the Word of God.
Triumph of the Church over water and fire.
titleStmt.author: Herring, Theodore, 1596-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] D[awson] for Nicholas Bourne, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The triumph of the Church over fire and water.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the south entrance of the Royall Exchange
